attacks.name: Weighty Smash
attacks.special: If a Crit is rolled and the target Character is on a smaller base size they become Prone after the Attack has been made.

attacks.name: Launch
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is made, the target Character may be thrown D6 inches in a direction of the Troll player's choosing. This Character is Prone.

attacks.name: Ravenous Chomp
attacks.special: If a Crit is rolled, Old Grogg may make a single attempt to Gobble the target for only an Easy Feat.

traits.name: Aquatic
traits.description: This character may move through water-based terrain as if it were Open Terrain. In addition, whilst in water-based terrain it gains +1" on all Movement (including Leg It rolls), and may re-roll a single dice for any Feat attempt.

traits.name: Grizzled Hide
traits.description: This character has +1 Armour that cannot be broken.
